Title: Resistance Is Futile
Plot: Dexter realizes it won't be easy to end things completely with Lila. Dexter tries to stay ahead of the investigations as the manhunt for the Bay Harbor Butcher intensifies. An enemy of Dexter figures out his secret.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Brian Scolaro, Eli Goodman, Adam Lieberman
